name: Blotchy Textur
glcm: High contrast and low correlation between neighboring pixels due to irregular patches.
lbp: Random patterns with abrupt changes in intensity values, resulting in diverse local structures.
gabor_filters: Detected at various orientations with varying frequency responses, indicating irregular surface patterns.
hog: Gradual gradient changes, but overall a lack of dominant orientations.
lpq: Low phase congruency due to the lack of consistent structure.
texture_energy: High energy at certain frequencies, indicating rough and non-uniform texture.
wavelet_transform: Irregular frequency components across scales, highlighting uneven patterns.
texton_histograms: Various texton occurrences, reflecting the heterogeneous nature of the texture.
haralick_features: High contrast, low correlation, and low homogeneity, pointing to irregular and uneven patterns.
local_phase_congruency: Low phase congruency due to the absence of regular structures.

name: Pitted Textur
glcm: Low contrast and high correlation between neighboring pixels due to the repetitive nature of pits.
lbp: Consistent circular patterns representing the presence of pits.
gabor_filters: Detected at various orientations with low frequency responses, indicating repetitive pit patterns.
hog: Dominant gradient orientations corresponding to pit edges.
lpq: High phase congruency due to the repeated pit structures.
texture_energy: Low energy at certain frequencies, indicating the presence of uniform pit patterns.
wavelet_transform: Concentrated energy at specific scales, representing repeated pit structures.
texton_histograms: High frequency of specific textons related to pit features.
haralick_features: Low contrast, high correlation, and high homogeneity, pointing to repetitive and uniform pit patterns.
local_phase_congruency: High phase congruency due to the regularity of pit structures.

texton_histograms: Various texton occurrences, reflecting the heterogeneous nature of flecked patterns.
haralick_features: Low contrast, low correlation, and low homogeneity, pointing to the irregular and scattered flecked textures.
local_phase_congruency: Low phase congruency due to the lack of consistent structure in flecks.
